attributes.action: make school leavers serve a term for two years in the armed forces like overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will teach them self respect, and to respect others creating not only a young trained force but also when they leave give them a better chance of a career because of the training they recieve in the forces.  This would also possibly stop them committing crime to a degree due to training given instead of hanging around street corners or causing vandalism.  Give the young a start in life.  Look at Greece its compulsary over there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
